about_the_game:
The evil pharmaceutical mogul Ultrachem has been tampering with a ton of top secret genetic projects lately. Everything seemed to be going as planned until the planet was invaded by the Gorgonaut Empire! With a healthy dose of gamma rays, the laboratory’s test gecko, who has been undergoing less-than-kind experiments lately, decides to exact their revenge!

You're deemed too high of a threat to the city of Metroville and you'll have 2 minutes until the city is completely nuked. The frat alien sect known as the UFBro's are on Lunar Break and they're screwing up the planet just for kicks (and a ton of views on GlikGlok). They'll deliver various mutated weapons like mallets, swords, and ray guns to up the ante, as well as delicious snacks. Destroy buildings, cars, and everything else as you absolutely RAGE!
